Author: the_jsne

Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: Maybe she felt hurt if she had worked to prepare a dinner and then felt like people didn't want it? (Though that doesn't make it ok to fire off snappish comments. I'm sorry what she said was hurtful <3)  You absolutely deserve to have food (and food you like!)
